content: **anna socks free knit sock pattern** the **anna socks** are a cozy and stylish knit featuring a beautiful knit/purl diamond stitch pattern that adds texture and elegance designed for comfort and versatility this **top-down sock pattern with a classic heel flap** comes in three sizes **child small adult and large adult** making it perfect for the whole family whether you re looking for a relaxing knit or a thoughtful handmade gift these socks are a great choice the pattern is engaging yet simple enough for adventurous beginners ready to explore textured sock knitting get the **free knit sock pattern** here 1 happy knitting errata - row 3 4 7 8 of the stitch pattern had a p2 which should be a p1 this has been fixed so all future pdf downloads will be the corrected version 1 https //amandammorse com/anna-socks-a-fun-and-cozy-free-knit-sock-pattern/
